TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule>, class System.Runtime.Serialization.IDeserializationCallback, class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public NotInheritable Class TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule Implements IDeserializationCallback, IEquatable(Of TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule), ISerializable

public: ref class TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule sealed : IEquatable<TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule ^>, System::Runtime::Serialization::IDeserializationCallback, System::Runtime::Serialization::ISerializable

summary.span: 提供有關時區調整的資訊 (例如日光節約時間的來回轉換)。

span.span: Provides information about a time zone adjustment, such as the transition to and from daylight saving time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別的有效開始和結束日期的特定時間變更與日光節約時間，會分別定義，以及其差異 （確切的調整讓時區標準時間變更的數量）。The class defines the effective start and end dates of a particular time change to and from daylight saving time, respectively, as well as its delta (the exact amount by which the adjustment causes the time zone's standard time to change). 此外，兩個屬性會傳回定義與標準時間的每個轉換發生時的物件。In addition, two properties return objects that define when each transition to and from standard time occurs. > [!NOTE] > 執行個體類別是不變。An instance of the class is immutable. 一旦建立物件之後，就無法修改其值。Once an object has been created, its values cannot be modified. 若要建立物件，呼叫`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)方法。To create a object, call the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method. 然後，您可以提供陣列物件到兩個多載方法。You can then supply an array of objects to two of the overloads of the method. 若要擷取特定時區的調整規則，請呼叫其方法，傳回的陣列物件。To retrieve the adjustment rules of a particular time zone, call its method, which returns an array of objects. ## Examples 下列範例會擷取所有本機系統上所定義的時區，並顯示其調整規則的完整資訊。The following example retrieves all time zones defined on the local system and displays complete information about their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#3)] 以下是輸出的一小部分的範例所產生。The following is a small portion of the output that is generated by the example. 確切的輸出會有所不同的作業系統和執行範例時的日期。The exact output will vary depending on the operating system and the date on which the example is run. ``` Morocco Standard Time Adjustment rules Adjustment rule #1 Start Date: Tuesday, January 01, 2008 End Date: Wednesday, December 31, 2008 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Saturday of May at 11:59 PM Annual End: The Last Sunday of August at 11:59 PM Adjustment rule #2 Start Date: Thursday, January 01, 2009 End Date: Thursday, December 31, 2009 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of May at 11:59 PM Annual End: The Third Thursday of August at 11:59 PM Coordinated Universal Time has no adjustment rules GMT Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 1:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 2:00 AM Greenwich Standard Time has no adjustment rules W. Europe Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Central Europe Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Romance Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM Central European Standard Time Adjustment rules Start Date: Monday, January 01, 0001 End Date: Friday, December 31, 9999 Time Change: 1:00 hours Annual Start: The Last Sunday of March at 2:00 AM Annual End: The Last Sunday of October at 3:00 AM W. Central Africa Standard Time has no adjustment rules ```

MemberSignature.Value: public static TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule CreateAdjustmentRule (DateTime dateStart, DateTime dateEnd, TimeSpan daylightDelta, TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd);

.method public static hidebysig class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule CreateAdjustmentRule(valuetype System.DateTime dateStart, valuetype System.DateTime dateEnd, valuetype System.TimeSpan daylightDelta, valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd) cil managed

Public Shared Function CreateAdjustmentRule (dateStart As DateTime, dateEnd As DateTime, daylightDelta As TimeSpan, daylightTransitionStart As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime, daylightTransitionEnd As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime) As TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule

public: static TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule ^ CreateAdjustmentRule(DateTime dateStart, DateTime dateEnd, TimeSpan daylightDelta, TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime daylightTransitionStart, TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime daylightTransitionEnd);

param.name: dateStart

span.span: The effective date of the adjustment rule.

param.span: 如果 dateStart 參數的值是 ，這會是第一個生效的時區調整規則。

span.span: If the value of the dateStart parameter is , this is the first adjustment rule in effect for a time zone.

param.name: dateEnd
param.span: 調整規則有效的最後一個日期。

span.span: The last date that the adjustment rule is in force.

param.span: 如果 dateEnd 參數的值是 ，則調整規則沒有結束日期。

span.span: If the value of the dateEnd parameter is , the adjustment rule has no end date.

param.name: daylightDelta
param.span: 調整所導致的時間變更。

span.span: The time change that results from the adjustment.

param.span: 這個值會加入至時區的 屬性，用來取得正確的 Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) 日光節約時間位移。

span.span: This value is added to the time zone's property to obtain the correct daylight offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

param.span: 這個值的範圍可從 -14 到 14。

span.span: This value can range from -14 to 14.

param.name: daylightTransitionStart
param.span: 定義日光節約時間起始的物件。

span.span: An object that defines the start of daylight saving time.

param.name: daylightTransitionEnd
param.span: 定義日光節約時間結束的物件。

span.span: An object that defines the end of daylight saving time.

summary.span: 為特定時區建立新的調整規則。

span.span: Creates a new adjustment rule for a particular time zone.

returns.span: 表示新調整規則的物件。

span.span: An object that represents the new adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法來建立一或多個自訂的時區調整規則。You can use this method to create one or more adjustment rules for a custom time zone. 陣列呼叫這個方法所傳回的物件然後做傳遞`adjustmentRules`兩個多載的參數方法。An array of the objects returned by calls to this method can then be passed as the `adjustmentRules` parameter to two overloads of the method. 此範例說明此程序。The example illustrates this procedure. > [!NOTE] > 方法可以只能用來定義新的時區調整規則; 它不能用來修改現有的時區調整規則。The method can be used only to define an adjustment rule for a new time zone; it cannot be used to modify an adjustment rule for an existing time zone. `dateStart`和`dateEnd`參數必須是日期值，而時間元件未或就會擲回。The `dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters must be date values without a time component or an is thrown. 時間元件可以移除擷取值的日期和時間的屬性，如下列陳述式中所示：The time component can be removed by retrieving a value from the date and time's property as shown in the following statements: ``` DateTime.MinValue.Date DateTime.MaxValue.Date DateTime.Now.Date dateVariable.Date ``` 屬性`dateStart`和`dateEnd`參數也必須。The property of the `dateStart` and `dateEnd` parameters must also be . 值`daylightDelta`參數的範圍從-14 到 14。The value of the `daylightDelta` parameter can range from -14 to 14. 總和`daylightDelta`參數和`baseUtcOffset`呼叫中使用的參數方法也必須範圍從-14 到 14 或就會擲回。The sum of the `daylightDelta` parameter and the `baseUtcOffset` parameter used in the call to the method must also range from -14 to 14 or an is thrown. > [!NOTE] > `daylightDelta`參數會定義時區標準時間日光節約時間的差異。The `daylightDelta` parameter defines the difference between a time zone's standard time and its daylight saving time. 它不是定義時區標準時間從國際標準時間 (UTC) 位移。It is not intended to define the time zone's standard time offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 類別會假設這個與 UTC 相差的整個生命週期的時區時間常數。The class assumes that this offset from UTC is constant throughout the life of the time zone. 若要反映的變更不會因應用程式的調整規則的 UTC 的時區的時差，您必須使用方法來建立新的自訂時區。To reflect a change in a time zone's offset from UTC that is not caused by the application of an adjustment rule, you must use the method to create a new custom time zone. ## Examples 下列範例會建立替代的中部標準時間區域，並定義三個調整規則，期間 1976年 1986，2006 1987 年和 2007年和更新版本。The following example creates an alternate Central Standard Time zone and defines three adjustment rules for the periods 1976-1986, 1987-2006, and 2007 and beyond. 這些規則會加入至泛型物件，其項目會複製到陣列。These rules are added to a generic object whose elements are then copied to a array. 這個陣列然後用於呼叫方法。This array is then used in the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 參數的 屬性不等於 。

span.span: The property of the or parameter does not equal .
-or-
The parameter is equal to the parameter.
-or-

exception.span: 或 參數包括當天時間的值。

span.span: The or parameter includes a time of day value.
is earlier than .
-or-
is less than -14 or greater than 14.
-or-

exception.span: 參數的 屬性不等於 0。

span.span: The property of the parameter is not equal to 0.
-or-

exception.span: 參數的 屬性不等於完整的秒數。

span.span: The property of the parameter does not equal a whole number of seconds.

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime DateEnd { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime DateEnd
Public ReadOnly Property DateEnd As DateTime
public: property DateTime DateEnd { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得調整規則停止生效的日期。

span.span: Gets the date when the adjustment rule ceases to be in effect.

value.span: 值，表示調整規則的結束日期。

span.span: A value that indicates the end date of the adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性是沒有時間元件的日期值。The value of the property is a date value without a time component. 因為通常不知道目前的調整規則的結束日期，您可以指派`DateTime.MaxValue.Date`至當您建立自訂的調整規則的屬性。Because the end date of the current adjustment rule is typically not known, you can assign `DateTime.MaxValue.Date` to the property when you create a custom adjustment rule. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非有充足的理由，否則您應該定義在時區採行標準時間的時間間隔內發生的調整規則的結束日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do otherwise, you should define the adjustment rule's end date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes standard time. 除非有充足的理由，若要這樣做，您應該不會定義期間的時區遵照日光節約時間的時間間隔內發生的調整規則的結束日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do so, you should not define the adjustment rule's end date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes daylight saving time. 例如，如果某時區的日光節約時間轉換會在年 3 月的第三個星期日而轉換到日光節約時間發生在 10 月的第一個星期日，調整規則的有效結束日期不應該年 12 月 31 日的特定年份，因為該日期的日光節約時間期間內，就會發生。For example, if a time zone's transition from daylight saving time occurs on the third Sunday of March and its transition to daylight saving time occurs on the first Sunday of October, the effective end date of the adjustment rule should not be December 31 of a particular year, since that date occurs within the period of daylight saving time. 根據預設，Windows XP 中的登錄會定義單一調整規則的結束日期為 12 月 31 日星期五 9999 (值`DateTime.MaxValue.Date`)，針對每個時區。By default, the registry in Windows XP defines a single adjustment rule whose end date is Friday, December 31, 9999 (the value of `DateTime.MaxValue.Date`), for each time zone. 在美國境內的時區，在 Windows Vista 登錄會定義兩個調整規則：For time zones in the United States, the registry in Windows Vista defines two adjustment rules: - 星期一、 年 1 月 01，0001 至 2006 年 12 月 31日日，星期日。Monday, January 01, 0001, to Sunday, December 31, 2006. - 星期一年 1 月 1日，2007 年 12 月 31 日星期五 9999。Monday, January 01, 2007, to Friday, December 31, 9999. 這表示，雖然儲存在登錄中時區調整規則適用於執行目前的時區相關作業，但無法可靠地用來擷取歷程時區資訊。This means that, although time zone adjustment rules stored in the registry are useful for performing current time zone-related operations, they cannot be reliably used for retrieving historical time zone information. 歷程記錄的時區感知應用程式中定義自訂的時區，有多個可用的調整規則的相關資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立有調整規則的時區區域](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For information about defining a custom time zone with multiple adjustment rules that can be used in a historical time zone-aware application, see [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示所有定義在本機電腦的系統登錄中，包括的開始和結束日期，其調整規則的時區資訊。The following example displays information about all of the time zones defined in the local computer's system registry, including the starting and ending dates of their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/cs/DateStart1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/vb/DateStart1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public DateTime DateStart { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.DateTime DateStart
Public ReadOnly Property DateStart As DateTime
public: property DateTime DateStart { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得調整規則生效的日期。

span.span: Gets the date when the adjustment rule takes effect.

value.span: 值，表示調整規則生效的時間。

span.span: A value that indicates when the adjustment rule takes effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性是沒有時間元件的日期值。The value of the property is a date value without a time component. 它會定義所在的特定調整規則會生效的日期。It defines the date on which a particular adjustment rule goes into effect. 這是一組轉換 （這通常是由一個轉換到日光節約時間和定義一個轉換回標準時間） 的開始生效的日期。This is the date in which a set of transitions (which typically are defined by one transition to daylight savings time and one transition back to standard time) go into effect. 例如，調整規則可能會進入 2017 年 1 月 1，會影響提供轉換到日光節約時間的第二個星期日的年 3 月和年 11 月的第一個星期日轉換回標準時間。For example, an adjustment rule might go into effect on January 1, 2017, that provides for a transition to daylight savings time on the second Sunday of March and for a transition back to standard time on the first Sunday of November. 請注意調整規則的開始日期不會繫結至第一個轉換的日期。Note that the starting date of the adjustment rule is not tied to the date of the first transition. 您可以指派`DateTime.MinValue.Date`至屬性，當您建立用於自訂的調整規則的時區感知應用程式中，不需要使用歷程時區資訊。You can assign `DateTime.MinValue.Date` to the property when you create a custom adjustment rule for use in a time zone-aware application that does not have to work with historic time zone information. > [!IMPORTANT] > 除非有充足的理由，否則您應該定義在時區採行標準時間的時間間隔內發生的調整規則的開始日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do otherwise, you should define the adjustment rule's start date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes standard time. 除非有充足的理由，若要這樣做，您應該不會定義期間的時區遵照日光節約時間的時間間隔內發生的調整規則的開始日期。Unless there is a compelling reason to do so, you should not define the adjustment rule's start date to occur within the time interval during which the time zone observes daylight saving time. 比方說，如果時區的日光節約時間轉換會在年 3 月的第三個星期日而轉換到日光節約時間發生在 10 月的第一個星期日，調整規則的有效開始日期不應該在特定的 1 年 1 月年份，因為該日期的日光節約時間期間內，就會發生。For example, if a time zone's transition from daylight saving time occurs on the third Sunday of March and its transition to daylight saving time occurs on the first Sunday of October, the effective start date of the adjustment rule should not be January 1 of a particular year, since that date occurs within the period of daylight saving time. 根據預設，Windows XP 中的登錄會定義單一調整規則的開始日期就是 January 01，星期一 0001 (值`DateTime.MinValue.Date`)，針對每個時區。By default, the registry in Windows XP defines a single adjustment rule whose start date is Monday, January 01, 0001 (the value of `DateTime.MinValue.Date`), for each time zone. 在美國境內的時區，在 Windows Vista 登錄會定義兩個調整規則：For time zones in the United States, the registry in Windows Vista defines two adjustment rules: - 星期一、 年 1 月 01，0001 至 2006 年 12 月 31日日，星期日。Monday, January 01, 0001, to Sunday, December 31, 2006. - 星期一年 1 月 1日，2007 年 12 月 31 日星期五 9999。Monday, January 01, 2007, to Friday, December 31, 9999. 這表示，雖然儲存在登錄中時區調整規則適用於執行目前的時區相關作業，但無法可靠地用來擷取歷程時區資訊。This means that, although time zone adjustment rules stored in the registry are useful for performing current time zone-related operations, they cannot be reliably used for retrieving historical time zone information. 歷程記錄的時區感知應用程式中定義自訂的時區，有多個可用的調整規則的相關資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立有調整規則的時區區域](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md)。For information about defining a custom time zone with multiple adjustment rules that can be used in a historical time zone-aware application, see [How to: Create Time Zones with Adjustment Rules](~/docs/standard/datetime/create-time-zones-with-adjustment-rules.md). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示所有定義在本機電腦的系統登錄中，包括的開始和結束日期，其調整規則的時區資訊。The following example displays information about all of the time zones defined in the local computer's system registry, including the starting and ending dates of their adjustment rules. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/cs/DateStart1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/System.TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule.DateStart/vb/DateStart1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeSpan DaylightDelta { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeSpan DaylightDelta
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightDelta As TimeSpan
public: property TimeSpan DaylightDelta { TimeSpan get(); };

summary.span: 取得形成時區的日光節約時間所需的時間量。

span.span: Gets the amount of time that is required to form the time zone's daylight saving time.

summary.span: 此時間量會加到時區與國際標準時間 (UTC) 的位移。

span.span: This amount of time is added to the time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).

value.span: 物件，表示將因為調整規則而加到標準時間變更的時間量。

span.span: A object that indicates the amount of time to add to the standard time changes as a result of the adjustment rule.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下列公式會定義時區的日光節約時間：The following formula defines a time zone's daylight saving time: ``` TimeZoneTime = BaseUtcOffset + DaylightDelta + UtcTime ``` 值屬性的範圍可以從 14 小時到-14 小時。The value of the property can range from 14 hours to -14 hours. > [!NOTE] > 屬性測量時區標準時間日光節約時間的差異。The property measures the difference between the time zone’s standard time and its daylight saving time. 它不適用於變更時區的標準位移與國際標準時間 (UTC)。It does not apply to changes in a time zone's standard offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). 若要表示已變更其標準時間時差的 UTC 的時區，您必須呼叫方法來建立新的時區。To represent a time zone that has changed its standard time offset from UTC, you must call the method to create a new time zone. 最常見的值屬性為 1.0 的小時。The most common value of the property is 1.0 hours. 日光節約時間調整規則的應用程式增加一小時的國際標準時間 (UTC) 時區的位移。The application of the daylight saving time adjustment rule increases the time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) by one hour.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightTransitionEnd As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime
public: property TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime DaylightTransitionEnd { TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得從日光節約時間轉換回標準時間之年度轉換的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the annual transition from daylight saving time back to standard time.

value.span: 物件，定義從日光節約時間轉換回該時區標準時間的年度轉換。

span.span: A object that defines the annual transition from daylight saving time back to the time zone's standard time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回物件屬性定義固定日期規則或浮動日期規則傳回的標準時間。The object returned by the property defines either a fixed-date rule or a floating-date rule for the return to standard time. 固定日期規則提供月、 日和轉換發生的時間。A fixed-date rule provides the month, day, and time of day on which the transition occurs. 浮動日期規則提供月、 週、 每週的日期和時間轉換發生的日期。A floating-date rule provides the month, week, day of the week, and time of day on which the transition occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart { get; }
.property instance valuetype System.TimeZoneInfo/TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart
Public ReadOnly Property DaylightTransitionStart As TimeZoneInfo.TransitionTime
public: property TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime DaylightTransitionStart { TimeZoneInfo::TransitionTime get(); };

summary.span: 取得從標準時間到日光節約時間之年度轉換的相關資訊。

span.span: Gets information about the annual transition from standard time to daylight saving time.

value.span: 物件，定義從某時區的標準時間到日光節約時間的年度轉換。

span.span: A object that defines the annual transition from a time zone's standard time to daylight saving time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回物件屬性定義固定日期規則或浮動日期規則轉換到日光節約時間。The object returned by the property defines either a fixed-date rule or a floating-date rule for the transition to daylight saving time. 固定日期規則提供月、 日和轉換發生的時間。A fixed-date rule provides the month, day, and time of day on which the transition occurs. 浮動日期規則提供月、 週、 每週日轉換發生的時間。A floating-date rule provides the month, the week, the day of the week, and the time of day on which the transition occurs.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Equals (TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule other);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Equals(class System.TimeZoneInfo/AdjustmentRule other) cil managed
Public Function Equals (other As TimeZoneInfo.AdjustmentRule) As Boolean
public: virtual bool Equals(TimeZoneInfo::AdjustmentRule ^ other);

param.name: other
param.span: 要與目前物件比較的物件。

span.span: The object to compare with the current object.

summary.span: 判斷目前 物件是否等於第二個 物件。

span.span: Determines whether the current object is equal to a second object.

returns.span: 如果兩個 物件具有相等值，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if both objects have equal values; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要判斷是否有兩個物件是否相等，方法會比較每個物件的成員值。To determine whether two objects are equal, the method compares the member values of each object. 兩個調整規則是否相等，如果有相同的生效日期、 相同的差異和相同的值，如所傳回的物件及其和屬性。Two adjustment rules are equal if they have the same effective dates, the same delta, and identical values for the objects returned by their and properties. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫比較中部標準時間與加拿大中部標準時間和墨西哥標準時間的調整規則的方法。The following example calls the method to compare the adjustment rules for Central Standard Time with those for Canada Central Standard Time and Mexico Standard Time. [!code-csharp[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/cs/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class/vb/System.TimeZone2.AdjustmentRule.Class.vb#2)] 此程式碼會在主控台中顯示下列輸出：This code displays the following output to the console: ``` Comparing Central Standard Time rule for 1/1/0001 to 12/31/9999 with: Canada Central Standard Time has no adjustment rules. Mexican CST for 1/1/0001 to 12/31/9999: Equal ```

summary.span: 做為雜湊函式，用於雜湊演算法和資料結構，例如雜湊資料表。

span.span: Serves as a hash function for hashing algorithms and data structures such as hash tables.

returns.span: 32 位元帶正負號的整數，充當目前 物件的雜湊程式碼。

span.span: A 32-bit signed integer that serves as the hash code for the current object.
